message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. Given its value and potential, I'm offering it to you at $2,200,000. I believe this price reflects its true worth and the benefits it will bring you.

I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm not willing to pay $2,200,000. I'm willing to pay $1,600,000 for the product, considering its worth to me is $800,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I see in the product.

Bob, I appreciate you counter-offering and recognizing the inherent value of the product. While your offer is closer to what I had in mind, I believe $2,000,000 is a more accurate reflection of its worth given its potential for return. This price is my final offer.

I understand your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $2,000,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,800,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I see in the product and the distance we've come in our negotiations.
